name: Edgedive
long_description:
Listening to your customers is really hard at scale. Edgedive makes it easy.

We collect, tag, and synthesize all incoming feedback from every channel and link it to your CRM so you Product, Eng, and CX teams can focus on building what their customers want.

🔎 Answer any question about anything your customers are saying

🎫 Automatically tag support tickets & quantify revenue impact

🗣️ Schedule custom, automatic voice of customer reports

💸 Identify gaps leading to churn or closed-lost deals

🧪 Get  a shortlist good beta testers for any feature

🤩 Monitor customer reactions to launches, live

…all in seconds, not days (or weeks).
one_liner: Understand what your customers are actually saying
subindustry: Real Estate and Construction -> Housing and Real Estate
